data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_da894b37bfb5cadb32307f371f31918a.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Each time Miya hits a target with her Basic Attack, she gains 5% Attack Speed for 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

After reaching full stacks, Miya summons a <font color="a6aafb">Moonlight Shadow</font> with each Basic Attack that deals 30<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and inherits a portion of Attack Effects.

Miya shoots two extra arrows with each Basic Attack, dealing 10<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target enemy and 30% damage to nearby targets. This effect lasts 4s. Each extra arrow inherits a portion of Attack Effects.

Miya launches an empowered arrow on the target area, dealing 270<font color="fba51f"> (+45% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies within and immobilizing them for 1.2s. The arrow then splits into 6 scattering minor arrows, each dealing 40<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s.

Miya removes all debuffs on her and conceals herself, gaining 35% extra Movement Speed. This state lasts 2s or until she launches an attack.

Miya gains full stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Moon Blessing</font> upon leaving the state.

data.name: Miya

__data.skilldesc:
For up to 8 Basic Attacks within the next 5s, increase Attack Speed to 1.5 times and the Attack Speed cap to 500%.
The Basic Attacks also <font color="62f8fe">ignore</font> 8 (+1*Hero Level) of the target's <font color="ffe63c">Physical Defense</font> and restore 60<font color="fba51f">(+0.15 Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+0.15 Total Magic Power)</font> HP on hit.
__data.skilldesc_text: For up to <Num2> Basic Attacks within the next <Num1>s, increase Attack Speed to <Num3> times and the Attack Speed cap to <%Num4>.####The Basic Attacks also [C2ignore] <Num5> of the target's [C5Physical Defense] and restore <Num6> HP on hit.
__data.skilldescemblem:
For up to 8 Basic Attacks within the next 5s, increase Attack Speed to 1.5 times and the Attack Speed cap to 500%.
The Basic Attacks also <font color="62f8fe">ignore</font> 8 (+1*Hero Level) of the target's <font color="ffe63c">Physical Defense</font> and restore 60<font color="fba51f">(+15% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+15% Total Magic Power)</font> HP on hit.

recommendmasterplan.description: Gold Lane: Attack Speed & Crit. Good for kiting and dealing high damage.

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 20% Attack Speed for 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 20% Attack Speed for 2s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Lifesteal
+40 Extra Physical Attack
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance

equiplist.equipskill1: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equiptips:
+35% Extra Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance
+20 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskilldesc: Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40% Crit Damage
+65 Extra Physical Attack
+25% Crit Chance

equiplist.equipskill2: Malefic Energy: Increases Basic Attack range by 12%. When hitting a target, gains 10% Movement Speed for 0.5s.

recommendmasterplan.name: MELONN
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: The Priestess of the Moon and protector of the Moonlit Forest.

assist.desc: Miya works well with Tanks who have powerful CC abilities like Belerick and Tigreal since their CCs give her more opportunities to dish out damage.

strong.desc: Miya counters heroes who rely on targeted CC effects, such as Saber and Eudora, because she can easily escape their CC and respond with a strong counterattack. The split arrows from her 1st Skill are also very effective against heroes that summon units, such as Sun.

weak.desc: Miya is countered by heroes with a lot of AOE damage, such as Pharsa and Yve, because they can still hit her while she is concealed.
